title: Understanding the Dataset
text: To identify the category with the highest expenditure, you need to analyze the dataset provided. Start by examining the data structure and the columns available.

title: Sorting the Data
text: Sorting the data by expenditure in descending order will help you quickly identify the category with the highest expenditure.

hintAnswer: Sort the data by expenditure in descending order
title: Sorting Method
text: What is the first step in identifying the category with the highest expenditure?
choices: Sort the data by expenditure in descending order
Calculate the average expenditure for each category
Create a pie chart of the expenditures
